DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter , randomize , parallel-group , placebo-controlled , active-referenced , double-blind study . After obtain write consent , patient meet eligibility criterion preliminary enrollment receive oral administration placebo single-blinded manner ( single-blind placebo run-in period ) . Then , patient meet eligibility criterion main enrollment receive drug placebo ( double-blind treatment period ) 4 week . Furthermore , patient follow 1 week confirm safety study drug treatment period ( safety follow-up period ) .
